Two years after being given unnatural powers in a science experiment, John (or Jonny as he now prefered to be known) was once again a regular young male student. It had seemed the effects of the brew had wore off with time and, without any more to his name, he had bid farewell to having such powers.

Now he was in college, studying towards his exams with his friends and working a stable part time job in a local supermarket. He longed to have the powers he once had. Little did he know, his wish was about to come true upon encountering a strange looking stone at the back of the sports field. He can find a way to harness the powers he once had and more...
